title.narrative: F.a: Programme communications and global education

description.narrative: CMI operates in complex conflict contexts where conflict dynamics and politics are far from simple. This means that for our key audiences, our work might appear as difficult to understand and esoteric. CMI?s communication work has a big role in tackling th ese challenges. Furthermore, Communication plays an important role in supporting CMI?s Development Cooperation Programme. Communication about our overall programme and individual projects whenever possible, strengthen programme?s transparency and accountab ility. Through the use of multiple, relevant communication channels, CMI is able to strengthen the visibility and understanding of the programme work. CMI communicates its activities at project and country level, with stakeholders, partners and networks, a s well as more broadly with decision-makers and the general public. Overall, CMI?s communications works to make CMI?s work known, appreciated and understood among key audiences. Though several set of activities, such as programme communications, Ahtisaari Days and our 15th anniversary seminar we work to raise broader awareness of our programme and its results, and importance of peace mediation in general.
